snippet: From Ruby Keeler to Judy Garland, singers retrace a movie-musical history in “Here’s to the Girls!: Hollywood’s Leading Ladies,” at the 92nd Street Y.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews Here's to the Girls!: Hollywood's Leading Ladies, program of songs from classic movies presented by Charles Busch at the 92nd Street Y as part of its Lyrics and Lyricists series; Nancy Anderson, Andrea Burns, Cady Huffman, Erin Maguire and Zakiya Young perform and Carl Andress directs.
lead_paragraph: From Ruby Keeler to Judy Garland, singers retrace a movie-musical history in “Here’s to the Girls!: Hollywood’s Leading Ladies,” at the 92nd Street Y.

headline.print_headline: With Dream-Girl Stand-Ins, a Riotous Heyday Recalled
headline.seo: ‘Here’s to the Girls!’ at the 92nd Street Y
headline.main: With Dream-Girl Stand-Ins, a Riotous Heyday Recalled
